verbose_text: Functional studies performed with a combination of several model organisms have shown that depletion of even a single core IFT-B1 subunit can cause the complete disassembly of IFT-B, eventually leading to the occurrence of so called ' bald ' mutants.
evidence: core IFT-B1 subunit                                                                                             can cause the complete disassembly of IFT-B
